exceptions.exn: In environment s : state c : ad pl, l : prec_list H : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l Unable to unify "Some (union_pl pl l)" with "MapGet prec_list ((fix union_mpl_0 (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list c pl | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => if (c =? c0)%N then M1 prec_list c (union_pl pl pl0) else match N.lxor c0 c with | 0%N => M1 prec_list c0 pl0 | N.pos p => MapPut1 prec_list c0 pl0 c pl p end | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match c with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s0) s1 | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s1) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s0) s1 | 1%N => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s1) end end) c pl s) c".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : state) (c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 c pl s) c = Some (union_pl pl l)

Premises:
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
union_mpl_0 = fix union_mpl_0 (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list c pl | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => if (c =? c0)%N then M1 prec_list c (union_pl pl pl0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match c with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s0) s1 | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s1) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s0) s1 | 1
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
union_pl = fix union_pl (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) {struct pl0} : prec_list := match pl0 with | prec_cons a pl00 pl01 => prec_cons a pl00 (union_pl pl01 pl1) | prec_empty => pl1 end : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
state = Map prec_list : Set
mpl_compat_7_def = fun s : state => forall (c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 c pl s) c = Some (union_pl pl l) : state -> Prop
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
u_conv_1_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p)
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
u_conv_1_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_merge_3_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_inv_1_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_inv_1_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
semantic_equiv_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), pre_reconnait d l tl l0 -> st_reconnait d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_inv_0_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_inv_0_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_4_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_invr_0_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_invr_0_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv0_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_0 d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_0 d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv0_1r : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_0_r d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_0_r d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_1 d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_1 d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv1_1r : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_1_r d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_1_r d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_5_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_invr_1_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_invr_1_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
u_conv_0_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
u_conv_1_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_1 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
u_conv_0_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0
u_conv_1_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_1 p0
sem_listes_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), liste_reconnait d pl tnil -> pl = prec_empty
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
conservation_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d
union_pl_1 : forall pl : prec_list, union_pl prec_empty pl = pl
union_pl_0 : forall pl : prec_list, union_pl pl prec_empty = pl
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
